description: This Python script demonstrates how to use personalized memories and summaries within an agent, utilizing a PostgreSQL database with pgvector, and includes example interactions with the agent.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of interacting with memories, models, and storage.

classes.name: AgentMemory
classes.description: Handles the agent's memories and summaries, stored in a database.

classes.name: PgMemoryDb
classes.description: PostgreSQL database interface for storing memories.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model interface for OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: PostgresAgentStorage
classes.description: Storage backend for agent sessions in PostgreSQL.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the agent to output a response, optionally streaming.
